events.message: I received the wrong size for my jacket and would like to return it for a refund. The order number is 123456789.
The customer's issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to their request for a return and refund related to sizing.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the incorrect jacket size.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. Iâ€™m here to help you with the return and refund process for your jacket.
Could you please confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging? This will help us process your return smoothly.
Yes, the jacket is still unused and is in the same packaging that it arrived in, including the tags and receipt.
Thank you for confirming. I have initiated the return process and arranged a prepaid shipping label for you to send the jacket back at no cost.
That sounds great, thank you for your quick help! I appreciate the prepaid shipping label to make the return easier.
The return has been processed successfully. Your refund will be credited back to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
We are checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
